snippet: A statement distributed by the lawyer for the American, Jeffrey Edward Fowle, was his family’s first comment on the detention, first reported on Friday.
abstract: Jeffrey E Fowle, Ohio municipal worker seized by North Korean authorities while visiting the country, is described by his lawyer as avid traveler and devoted husband and father; statement is his family's first comment on his detention.
lead_paragraph: A statement distributed by the lawyer for the American, Jeffrey Edward Fowle, was his family’s first comment on the detention, first reported on Friday.

headline.main: American Held in North Korea Described as Family Man
headline.print_headline: North Korea: Detained American Was on Vacation, His Lawyer Says
